content: romi hot water bottle cover the romi hot water bottle cover is the perfect project for a knitter wanting to make something quick and fun knitted from the bottom up and in the round using soft boucle yarn it will become a favorite accessory when curling up on the sofa sizing size cover should fit a standard 2 liter hot water bottle see picture for reference materials gauge 19 sts x 29 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 in suggested needles 4 mm u s size 6 60 cm 24 inches circular needles and/or 4 mm u s size 6 dpns 6 mm u s size 10 60 cm 24 inches circular needles and/or 6 mm u s size 10 dpns notions stitch markers scissors darning needle yarn 50 grams of aran/worsted weight yarn yardage 153 yards / 140 meters suggested yarn alpaca boucle by drops aran weight 80% alpaca 15% wool 5% manufactured fibers 50g 153 yards/ 140 meters 1 skein required abbreviations co cast on k2togtbl knit two stitches together yo yarn over through back loop k knit bobble bind off st s stitch es pm place marker kfb knit front and back increase repeat repeat k2tog knit two together round s round s notes worked from bottom up and in the round starting with the turkish cast on increases are made to shape the bottom of the cover the body of the cover is worked using stockinette stitch the neck is shaped with decreases and finished with stockinette stitch using the magic loop method or dpns 2 pattern using a 4 mm us6 / 60 cm 24 inches needle work turkish cast on co 22 sts on each needle 44 sts total here s a tutorial to help you with the turkish cast on https //www youtube com/watch v=7oz003df74e&t=189s you can also use judy s magic cast on if you are not comfortable with the above techniques you can always use the long tail cast on but you will have to sew end closed when finished using mattress stitch also this method won t provide a seamless result if you decide to follow the long tail cast on you will need to co 44 sts 22 sts for each side row 1 kfb k to last two sts kfb k1 24 sts repeat on second needle 48 sts total row 2 k to end repeat row 1-2 until you have 32 sts on each needle or 64 sts total body k all sts until piece measures 21 cm 8 from co top shaping row 1 k1tog k to 3 sts k2togtbl k1 30 sts repeat on second needle 60 sts total repeat this round until you have 12 sts on each needle or 24 sts total pm note you may need to adjust the decreases to a number that fits your hot water bottle cover top part e g you may want to decrease to 18 sts rather than 12
